Detailed Description

Axis-aligned Bounding Box class used by all shapes

bool BBox::IntersectP ( const Ray &  ray,
double *  hitt0 = NULL,
double *  hitt1 = NULL 
) const

Calculates the intersection of a given ray with the bounding box. Returns false if the ray and box do not intersect. If an intersection does occur, the intersection points are returned as pointers.
